message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this item. I think it's really valuable, so I'm starting the price at $150.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for offering. $150 seems a bit steep for me. Would you consider $70?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  $70 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for.  Could you do $120?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
